name: Nextcloud
description: Self-hosted file sync and collaboration platform. Your own cloud storage.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  db:
    image: mariadb:latest
    container_name: nextcloud-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: --transaction-isolation=READ-COMMITTED --binlog-format=ROW
    volumes:
      - {{DB_PATH}}:/var/lib/mysql
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD={{MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}}
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD={{MYSQL_PASSWORD}}
      - MYSQL_DATABASE={{MYSQL_DATABASE}}
      - MYSQL_USER={{MYSQL_USER}}
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=nextcloud"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=productivity"

  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud:latest
    container_name: nextcloud
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:80"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/var/www/html/data
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/var/www/html/config
      - {{APPS_PATH}}:/var/www/html/custom_apps
    environment:
      - MYSQL_HOST=db
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD={{MYSQL_PASSWORD}}
      - MYSQL_DATABASE={{MYSQL_DATABASE}}
      - MYSQL_USER={{MYSQL_USER}}
    depends_on:
      - db
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=nextcloud"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=productivity"

notes: Create admin account on first access
Install apps from the built-in app store
Consider using Redis for better performance
